thread.title: Oscar Pistorius to be released from jail on Oct. 20 (Yahoo Sports)
thread.title_full: Oscar Pistorius to be released from jail on Oct. 20 (Yahoo Sports)

author: ASFN Admin
title: Oscar Pistorius to be released from jail on Oct. 20 (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,278 Oscar Pistorius to be released from jail on Oct. 20 (Yahoo Sports) Oscar Pistorius, the Olympic runner who shot his girlfriend to death on Valentine's Day 2013, can leave prison and move to house arrest next week, South Africa's Department of Corrections said Thursday. A parole board at the prison where Pistorius has served nearly a year of his five-year sentence for manslaughter made the decision. The board ''approved the placement of offender Oscar Pistorius under correctional supervision as from 20 October 2015,'' the corrections department said in Thursday's statement.
